transcript:
Customer: Raghunandan
Halo
Customer: Halo
Executive: Haan, Hazari?
Customer: Haan, haan sir, disconnect disconnect ho gaya tha, aap bataiye sir.
Executive: Main bata raha hu, jaise ki aapne preferred nahi liya hai, samjho baat.
Abhi aapke yaha se promotion kuch level pe nahi ho raha hai, correct?
Jab aap lenge to promotion ka level aapka badh jayega.
Customer: Haan, theek hai.
Executive: Ab jab abhi socho ki abhi humne promotion nahi kiye hai aur abhi humko man lo buylead aaj ki date mein ghat rahi hai.
Aap baat samjho.
Aur promotion aap log chalu kar doge to us time mein fir hamara kya hoga?
Us time mein to fir aur kya kami ho payega?
Executive: Nahi sir, mera mera ek yaha pe na point ko thoda sa samajhne ki koshish kariyega, main aapki baat samajh raha hu sir, hai na main aapka puri tarah point samajh raha hu, seedhi seedhi si baat hai agar hum aapko upar ke promotion mein lekar ke aayenge kisi bhi cheez ko lekar ke to seedhi si baat hai aapko leads ki kami padegi.
Yahi hai na?
Customer: [inaudible]
Executive: Kyunki kyunki abhi aapko kam pad raha hai to aage chal ke jab aur promote hoge to aur lead ki kami padegi, yahi kehna chah rahe hai na sir?
Customer: Yes, correct.
Executive: Haan, to mera yaha pe yaha pe mera concern thoda sa samjhiega sir, baat ye hai ki dekhiye buyleads jo hum consume karte hai hum daily basis pe ya hum weekly basis pe bhi agar hum discuss kare.
To bhai man lo abhi jo main aapko bata raha tha ki leads thodi jayegi.
To jo bhi leads increase hogi usme hum aisa to hai nahi na ki hum daily basis pe utni sari ki sari consume kar le ya hafte bhar mein ya 10 din mein hum consume kar le, ho sakta hai kuch kam rahe ya ho sakta hai kam pade bhi, ye bhi main bol raha hu, but baat ye hai ki jo calls aur inquiry ka jo flow hai wo aapko increase hoga to sir ek point mera yaha pe ye hai ki sirf buyleads ke bharose hum logo ka kam nahi chal raha, yaha pe hamara inquiry aur call ka bhi increase hoga to wo help karega sir ki humko aur business mein aage rakhne mein aur wedding card printing machine mein agar hum lenge sir, to ek baat main aapko bata du buyleads to aapko jo milenge milenge wo to dusri cheez hai lekin wedding wedding card printing machine wale mein is time pe aapko calls aur inquiry ka flow sabse jyada milega.
Aur ye baat aap bhi jaan hi rahe hoge.
Customer: Haan sir.
Executive: Main baat karta hu ruko thodi der se.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer concerned about decrease in buyleads.

- Customer worried about future lead shortage.



Resolution:

- Executive explained benefits of promotion.

- Executive mentioned increase in calls and inquiries.

- Executive highlighted wedding card printing machine benefits.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, promotion, inquiry, wedding card
